Uses of Package
com.basho.riak.client.jiak

Packages that use com.basho.riak.client.jiak
com.basho.riak.client.jiak   
 

Classes in com.basho.riak.client.jiak used by com.basho.riak.client.jiak
JiakBucketInfo
          Adds convenience methods to RiakBucketInfo to set the bucket schema properties specific to the Jiak interface.
JiakBucketResponse
          Decorates an HttpResponse to interpret listBucket response from Riak's Jiak interface which returns a JSON object with the keys "schema" and "keys".
JiakFetchResponse
          Decorates an HttpResponse to interpret fetch and fetchMeta responses from Jiak's Raw interface which returns object metadata and value directly in the message body as JSON.
JiakObject
          Implementation of RiakObject which interprets objects retrieved from Riak's Jiak interface.
JiakStoreResponse
          Decorates an HttpResponse to interpret store responses from the Jiak interface which should contain the entire object with metadata (i.e.
JiakWalkResponse
          Decorates an HttpResponse to interpret walk responses from Jiak.
